signature.embedding_text: When a student scores X percent marks he failed by X marks. But when he scores X percent, he passes. Find passing percent.

trick.name: Quick Passing Percentage Trick
trick.one_liner: Jab score X% se fail aur X% se pass, toh passing % jaldi se nikaalo!

steps.action_hi: Har percent ke liye marks nikaalo

trick.memory_hook: 28% fail, 41% pass, 42.5% se clear ho jaayega class!

common_mistakes.mistake: Confusing percentage difference with marks difference
common_mistakes.wrong: Using marks difference directly as percentage
common_mistakes.why: Students often mix up percentage and marks calculations

deep.explanation: Yeh trick percentage ke questions ko jaldi solve karne ke liye hai. Pehle percentage ka antar nikaalo, phir har percent ke liye marks ka calculation karo. Isse passing marks aur percentage jaldi mil jaayega. Yeh samajhna zaroori hai ki percentage aur marks alag cheezein hain, aur unka calculation alag tareeke se hota hai. Is trick se aap common mistakes avoid kar sakte ho aur exam mein time bacha sakte ho.

shortcut.explanation: Jaldi se percentage aur marks ka antar nikaalo, aur passing percentage ka calculation karo. Yeh trick se aap jaldi answer nikaal sakte ho bina galti kiye.

instant.explanation: Jab score X% se fail aur X% se pass, toh passing % jaldi se nikaalo!
